channel.title: Code for the update timer
channel.description:
I need a code or something that will give me the update timer so when i type ::update+(# of seconds) it will appear for everyone logged into my server that the server is going to be updated in that amount of time.
Is there a TuT for this? If so i couldn't find it ... i don't want to break any rules :| :D

item.title: Code for the update timer
item.dc:creator: @JMac JMac
item.description:
@JMac wrote:

I had one on my old testscape server i had like a year and a half ago. But now i run through pimpscape and i can’t find one.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 04:29:59 PM[/size][hr]anyone else have any idea of what im talking about

Read full topic

item.title: Code for the update timer
item.dc:creator: @t_cups t cups
item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

i dont think there is such a thing…i’ve never heared about it, you can just type ::yell (your message here)

Read full topic
